casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Taneff, Appellant, v. City of Columbus et al., Appellees.

[Cite as State ex rel. Taneff v. Columbus (2001), 93 Ohio St.3d 500.]

(No. 01-684 Submitted September 18, 2001 Decided October 31, 2001.) Michael J. Muldoon, for appellant. Janet Jackson, City Attorney, and Michael C. Matuska, Assistant City Attorney, for appellee city of Columbus.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. *501Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and Daniel M. Hall, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee Industrial Commission.
